page.title: 03GEOGRAPHY (1)
page.content: {INDUSTRY }The only industry left in this area is the Ford car factory. Some of the people from Speke and Hale work in the factory.{ {FARMING }There are three farms in the area there is Yew Tree Farm, Brook Farm, and Manor Farm. On the eastern edge of the area are Pickerings Farm and Hale Gate Farm. {WOODLAND }All of the woodland in the area is situated in the eastern section nearer to Hale. The two local schools are named after the Millwoods and the Alder plantation. To the north of Hale village there is Big Boars wood, Little Boars Wood, Old and Ice Plantation in Hale park. { {SALTMARSH }There is saltmarsh which runs along the southern length of the area at Oglet banks.
